attributes.action: Urge Gorden Brown,& the MoD to pay towards the cost of this years 25th anniversarary, 'Pilgrimage' Flight back to the Falkland Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, respectfully submit that,the prime minister to,bring to the attention of gordon brown, to arrange, with the treasury, to provide: part of the financial costs so as to enable, some 200,veterans, and family members  some 100 being cared for by Combat Stress, A Registered Charity, who are sending medical support, on the flight for those suffering , from WAR TRAUMA, ( PTSD ),1982 War Veterans back to the Falkland Islands.In this the 25 year since the War, tremendus efforts are being made to raise funds, by sama 82, and the falkland islanders, and individuals, from all over the country, or provide accomadation on the island, or offer assistance, in whatever manner practicable
